string.text: Adjust the minimap opacity. Larger values make it more opaque. Smaller values make it more transparent.
NOTE: set this to -1 to use the minimap's default value.
Adjust the horizontal position of the clock. Positive values move it to the right. Negative values move it to the left.
Adjust the vertical position of the clock. Positive values move it down. Negative values move it up.
